content: I think I'll explore both options further and see which one I like better. I've been eyeing the Coach Parker bag, and I love their classic, timeless designs. But Kate Spade's playful, whimsical style is also really appealing to me. Maybe I'll check out their websites and see what kind of blazers they have available. Do you think I could find a blazer that's similar in style to the Coach Parker bag?
